title: The Dew of Their Youth
author: Crockett, S. R. (Samuel Rutherford)
snippet: And she does not mean either the house atSciennes or the Kirkpatrick mansion near the Water of Leith.

title: The Dew of Their Youth
author: Crockett, S. R. (Samuel Rutherford)

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: They accordingly descended into the valley of the Nith, andcommitted great spoil on the lands belonging to Douglas of Drumlanrig, Creichton,Lord Sanquhar, Grierson of Lagg, and Kirkpatrick of Closeburn, all of themindependent barons of high birth and great power.
